title: Champion spotlights

embed.description: Welcome to the League of Legends Champion Spotlight. In this edition, we're showcasing the new and improved Soraka, complete with updated visuals, animations, and VO. Check out the full video for a guide to new Soraka's abilities, gameplay, and suggested build.

body:
Hello once again riot
I have been very interested in the support role the main reason being no one else in my group will even touch a sup JK but anyway in the champion spotlights such as soraka's (link above) there are some very big differences such as straka doesn't give mana anymore and her q is changed as well. The other thing is do you guys hate Janna for some reason because she doesn't have a champion spotlight I don't know why but maybe you can try to update the spot lights when abilities get changed or there are big changes to the game such as runes and masterys (mainly mastery's and items) . I really hope you guys can try fix this

replies.body: I kinda like the fact they keep the old spotlights and cinematics. It makes league feel kind of historic and grand, that the game has evolved so much since it's first iteration, and that even though I've only been playing league for a year, that I can play and be part of it.
